title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Developing Critical Thinking in Technical and Vocational Education: Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking stages (analysis, evaluation, reasoning) to solve real-world scientific and technological problems.

Learners form teams of two peers on a mobile microlearning platform, complete a three-stage collaborative problem-solving activity (problem analysis → solution development → implementation planning) for one of three clinical scenarios with ≥80% participation (based on comments/feedback submissions).
Learners can evaluate the credibility of technical documents and derive improvement points using critical thinking tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
